Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is light-brown in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and very faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394036) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394036)
Additional IDs: Excavation/small finds number: 32-33/45 (Egypt Exploration Society excavation number)
